name: Champion Soccer
description:
CHAOTIC SOCCER GAME!

TELEPORTING BALLS AND "OLD MAN WALKING" AIs and kinda cringe game design... ! not game but chaotic game development...

CONTROLLERS : 

WASD : MOVEMENT 

LEFT CLICK : SHOOT

RIGHT CLICK: DRIPPLING (ALSO MAIN KEY OF  FAST MOVEMENT)

SHIFT : RUN

SPACE : JUMP

MULTIPLAYER  FPS SOCCER GAME 

YOU CAN PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS IN MULTIPLAYER MODE

DEVELOPED BY TRAINSPOTTING STUDIO
